title: Slow motion in game whaaaat
body:
So I was lagging hard ingame, but then it went back to normal 60ms~

Howeveeerr, everything was in slow motion with eventual jumping around. 

I tried restarting LoL but to no use, everything is in slow motion what the fkk :P I'm writting this while in the match

replies.body: i have that experince before too

You may be experiencing some bad latency hikes and *Packet Loss*. I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as your first step, as this usually resolves these sorts of issues.

If you have any further issues after taking those steps, let me know.
Thanks, if it happens again I'll check it out. It was normalized in the next match I started (vs Bots and after vs players)
